featured.text: Instead of the traditional bare pod-sized style, new chains now feature interior design that appeals to digitally connected travelers from around the world.
Pod hotels are also seen in Europe and North America, especially in big cities like New York, London, and Paris.

definition.zh_def: 豆莢；艙；一組相似的物體或生物
definition.en_def: A pod is a casing or shell that contains seeds or a group of similar items.
definition.example: The gardener harvested the peas from the pod.
